downloadDescription: ​This document explains how to implement Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Retail 8.0 (April 2018) or Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations, Enterprise edition 8.0 (April 2018) in a way that complies with the Payment Card Industry (PCI) Data Security Standard version 3.2. ​
detailsSection: ​This document is intended for customers, Microsoft Certified Partners, resellers, and integrators who are deploying Retail or Finance and Operations in a retail organization where electronic credit card and debit card payments are accepted, and where Retail or Finance and Operations is used as the payment application.​
